location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Captain E Wyatt

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a previous unresponded to letter and his uncertainty as to whom expenses for horses belonging to the East India Company, and left in his care, should be sent to. The letter also gives details on the state of the horses and asks where they should be sent to.
